title: Show 233 - Stewart MacDonald
itunes:title: Show 233 - Stewart MacDonald
itunes:subtitle: The SNP's Defence Spokesperson at Westminster is also one of its most popular and respected MPs. He's written a new report called Disinformation in Scottish Public Life which highlights the interferences of Russia, Iran and China in ...
description:
The SNP's Defence Spokesperson at Westminster is also one of its most popular and respected MPs. He's written a new report called Disinformation in Scottish Public Life which highlights the interferences of Russia, Iran and China in British and Scottish public life. Stewart also talks frankly about the challenges posed by Scottish independence in the defence realm. More importantly, Stewart shares a brilliant Glasgow pub recommendation. 

 

Read Stewart's Report, Disinformation in Scottish Public Life: https://www.stewartmcdonald.scot/files/disinformation-in-scottish-public-life-june-2021.pdf


Follow Stewart on Twitter: @StewartMacDonald

 

Subscribe to Matt's other podcast British Scandal here or wherever you get your podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/british-scandal/id1563775446

 

Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com

 

Order Matt's book 'Politically Homeless' here: https://blackwells.co.uk/bookshop/product/2100000262618

 

Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde

 

Follow Matt on WTSocial: https://wt.social/u/matt-forde

 

For the latest UK Government advice on coronavirus go to: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

 

For the latest Scottish Government advice on coronavirus go to: https://www.gov.scot/coronavirus-covid-19/


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
